body_html:
Or, we can ignore my previous comment for the moment and just implement a super quick solution for this task:

  • show links to the Teams app for those projects where submitter.github_handle = mentor_github_handle (95% of all projects)
  • leave everything as is (no links) for those projects where submitter.github_handle != mentor_github_handle (5% of all projects)
body_text:
Or, we can ignore my previous comment for the moment and just implement a super quick solution for this task:

show links to the Teams app for those projects where submitter.github_handle = mentor_github_handle (95% of all projects)
leave everything as is (no links) for those projects where submitter.github_handle != mentor_github_handle (5% of all projects)
body:
Or, we can ignore my previous comment for the moment and just implement a super quick solution for this task:
 * show links to the Teams app for those projects where `submitter.github_handle = mentor_github_handle` (95% of all projects)
 * leave everything as is (no links) for those projects where `submitter.github_handle != mentor_github_handle` (5% of all projects)

![joxi_screenshot_1486576221858](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1745735/22750840/8e4e4962-ee32-11e6-81c8-20b4b160c468.png)
![joxi_screenshot_1486577415159](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1745735/22750841/8e4eb00a-ee32-11e6-8832-90d29d9a715f.png)
